price: 92 auxquels il sera lancé : « Où sont ces fausses divinités que vous adoriez
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
